help.GET:
Get sheet data with { ? }
? <sheet> <field> <value>

Or to learn more about the sheet, try:
?? <sheet>
help.SET:
Add or update sheet data with { + }, try:
+ <sheet> <field> <value>

Or to learn more about the sheet, try:
?? <sheet>
help.DEL:
Delete sheet data with { - }, try:
- <sheet> <field> <value>

Or to learn more about the sheet, try:
?? <sheet>

messages.HELLO: Hello %s! Welcome to the shit show!

error.NO_DM: #Error [I can't run this query through DM]
error.NO_SPREADSHEET: #Error [This channel is not setup with a spreadsheet]
error.NO_PERMISSION: #Error [You do not have permission to use this command]
error.NO_GUILDID: #Error [Your guildID needs to be a number]
error.RESULTS_TOO_LONG: #Error [The results of this request are too long try again with more details]
error.GET_HELP:
#Error [Your command was malformed], try:
? <sheet> <field> <value>

Or to learn more about the sheet, try:
?? <sheet>
error.SET_HELP:
#Error [Your command was malformed], try:
+ <sheet> <field> <value>

Or to learn more about the sheet, try:
?? <sheet>
error.DEL_HELP:
#Error [Your command was malformed], try:
- <sheet> <field> <value>

Or to learn more about the sheet, try:
?? <sheet>
error.ERROR_QUERY: #Error [There was an error with your query]
